definition.@value: Glycosuria (glucose in the urine) at normal blood glucose levels due to inadequate renal tubular resorption. Can be due to above normal glomerular filtration as in pregnancy or occurs residual nephrons in renal failure, or reduced tubular resorption.

label.@value: Renal glycosuria associated with acute or chronic renal failure
Renal glycosuria associated with familial or genetic disorders elsewhere classified
